articles.title: Hamilton's first hint at why he's making shock Ferrari move - The Race
articles.description: Ferrari's new Formula 1 recruit Lewis Hamilton has offered more detail on his decision to leave Mercedes for the Italian team
articles.content:
Ferrari's new Formula 1 recruit Lewis Hamilton says he is driven by the same "feeling" in making the move as he was when he originally joined Mercedes in 2013.
